title: The Zonders FONT INQUIRY
content:
I know that most (if not all of these) are custom typefaces, but they are so amazing that I'm wondering if there are any fonts out there that look similar to these 80s-type brush script fonts.

![some_text](http://web.archive.org/web/20130829021650im_/http:/farm4.static.flickr.com/3437/3918444803_12e7508307.jpg)

![some_text](http://web.archive.org/web/20130829021650im_/http:/www.smashingdownloads.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/01/Zonders.jpg)

![some_text](http://web.archive.org/web/20130829021650im_/http:/premium.fileden.com/premium/2008/8/17/2054250/zonders27.jpg)

![some_text](http://web.archive.org/web/20130829021650im_/http:/www.themetatron.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/MinitelRose.jpg)
author: Andrew Russo
